long.ar,da,el,fa,fr,hi,id,it,ja,ko,mr,ms,nl,n:
StorageAce provides ability to easily manage Cookies, Local Storage and Session Storage.

ğŸ…µğŸ…´ğŸ…°ğŸ†ƒğŸ†„ğŸ†ğŸ…´ğŸ†‚

âšâ–ˆâ•â• â„‚ğ• ğ• ğ•œğ•šğ•–ğ•¤ â•â•â–ˆâš

â˜… Add Cookie
â˜… Import Cookies in JSON format
â˜… Edit Cookies using form
â˜… Edit Cookies using JSON Editor
â˜… Delete Cookies
â˜… Search Cookies by cookie name or cookie value
â˜… Sort Cookies by cookie domain, cookie name, cookie path and cookie value by clicking table column headers.
â˜… Protect Cookies (Set cookies as read-only)
â˜… Block cookies by domain, name and value filters
â˜… Export cookies in JSON, Netscape HTTP Cookie File, Semicolon separated name=value pairs, Perl::LWP formats. Also, you can export cookies in JSON format that can be imported by Puppeteer.
â˜… Backup Cookies
â˜… Select multiple Cookies and do actions like view, edit in JSON editor, delete, protect, unprotect, block, save etc.
â˜… Limit Max Age of Cookies.
â˜… Quick Filters available for filtering cookies in one click.

âšâ–ˆâ•â• ğ•ƒğ• ğ•”ğ•’ğ•ğ•¤ğ•¥ğ• ğ•£ğ•’ğ•˜ğ•– â•â•â–ˆâš

â˜… Add item in local storage
â˜… Import items in local storage in JSON format
â˜… Edit item in local storage using form
â˜… Edit item in local storage using JSON Editor
â˜… Delete items in local storage
â˜… Search items in local storage by key or value
â˜… Sort items in local storage by key/value by clicking table column headers.
â˜… Export local storage items in JSON format
â˜… Select multiple items of local storage and do actions like view, edit in JSON editor, delete etc.

âšâ–ˆâ•â• ğ•Šğ•–ğ•¤ğ•¤ğ•šğ• ğ•Ÿğ•¤ğ•¥ğ• ğ•£ğ•’ğ•˜ğ•– â•â•â–ˆâš

â˜… Delete items in session storage

â˜… Sort items in session storage by key/value by clicking table column headers.
â˜… Export session storage items in JSON format
â˜… Select multiple items of session storage and do actions like view, edit in JSON editor, delete etc.

âšâ–ˆâ•â• ğ•†ğ•¥ğ•™ğ•–ğ•£ ğ”½ğ•–ğ•’ğ•¥ğ•¦ğ•£ğ•–ğ•¤ â•â•â–ˆâš

â˜… Right-click and select "StorageAce" via Context menu 
â˜… Incognito mode Supported and settings are synced in incognito and normal modes.
â˜… Beautified JSON View for storage items
â˜… Choose path for download.
â˜… Ability to Remember last download path.
â˜… Extra feature to allow copying JWT using "Copy JWT" button. It will copy the JWT in the selected storage type.
long.am,bg,bn,cs,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,:
StorageAce provides ability to easily manage Cookies, Local Storage and Session Storage.

ğŸ…µğŸ…´ğŸ…°ğŸ†ƒğŸ†„ğŸ†ğŸ…´ğŸ†‚

âšâ–ˆâ•â• â„‚ğ• ğ• ğ•œğ•šğ•–ğ•¤ â•â•â–ˆâš

â˜… Add Cookie
â˜… Import Cookies in JSON format
â˜… Edit Cookies using form
â˜… Edit Cookies using JSON Editor
â˜… Delete Cookies
â˜… Search Cookies by cookie name or cookie value
â˜… Sort Cookies by cookie domain, cookie name, cookie path and cookie value by clicking table column headers.
â˜… Protect Cookies (Set cookies as read-only)
â˜… Block cookies by domain, name and value filters
â˜… Export cookies in JSON, Netscape HTTP Cookie File, Semicolon separated name=value pairs, Perl::LWP formats. Also, you can export cookies in JSON format that can be imported by Puppeteer.
â˜… Backup Cookies
â˜… Select multiple Cookies and do actions like view, edit in JSON editor, delete, protect, unprotect, block, save etc.
â˜… Limit Max Age of Cookies.
â˜… Quick Filters available for filtering cookies in one click.

âšâ–ˆâ•â• ğ•ƒğ• ğ•”ğ•’ğ•ğ•¤ğ•¥ğ• ğ•£ğ•’ğ•˜ğ•– â•â•â–ˆâš

â˜… Delete items in local storage
â˜… Search items in local storage by key or value
â˜… Sort items in local storage by key/value by clicking table column headers.
â˜… Export local storage items in JSON format
â˜… Select multiple items of local storage and do actions like view, edit in JSON editor, delete etc.

âšâ–ˆâ•â• ğ•Šğ•–ğ•¤ğ•¤ğ•šğ• ğ•Ÿğ•¤ğ•¥ğ• ğ•£ğ•’ğ•˜ğ•– â•â•â–ˆâš

â˜… Add item in session storage
â˜… Import items in session storage in JSON format
â˜… Edit item in session storage using form
â˜… Edit item in session storage using JSON Editor
â˜… Delete items in session storage
â˜… Search items in session storage by key or value
â˜… Sort items in session storage by key/value by clicking table column headers.
â˜… Export session storage items in JSON format
â˜… Select multiple items of session storage and do actions like view, edit in JSON editor, delete etc.

âšâ–ˆâ•â• ğ•†ğ•¥ğ•™ğ•–ğ•£ ğ”½ğ•–ğ•’ğ•¥ğ•¦ğ•£ğ•–ğ•¤ â•â•â–ˆâš

â˜… Right-click and select "StorageAce" via Context menu 
â˜… Incognito mode Supported and settings are synced in incognito and normal modes.
â˜… Beautified JSON View for storage items
â˜… Choose path for download.
â˜… Ability to Remember last download path.
â˜… Extra feature to allow copying JWT using "Copy JWT" button. It will copy the JWT in the selected storage type.

âšâ–ˆâ•â• Privacy â•â•â–ˆâš
StorageAce respects your privacy and all your data is safe.

If browser syncing is enabled, then the settings of the extension is synced to any Chrome browser that the user is logged into.

All your localStorage, sessionStorage and cookies remains offline.
long.ca,es:
StorageAce provides user-friendly UI that helps the user to easily manage Cookies, Local Storage and Session Storage.
